analysis.description:
Burner.Purge (/unique_contracts/0x711a1836b306d2eac12129c0b97da8931ee80fe2.sol#226-236) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance / 1000) (/unique_contracts/0x711a1836b306d2eac12129c0b97da8931ee80fe2.sol#228)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x711a1836b306d2eac12129c0b97da8931ee80fe2.sol:
	Contract GeXCHANGE has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x711a1836b306d2eac12129c0b97da8931ee80fe2.sol#213-214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x711a1836b306d2eac12129c0b97da8931ee80fe2.sol#79) is not in mixedCase
